description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国药理学家，中国共产党党员。曾任温州医学院药学院院长、杭州医学院副院长，现任杭州医学院院长、党委副书记。
description.en: A pharmacologist from the People's Republic of China and a member of the Communist Party of China. He formerly served as the Dean of the School of Pharmacy at Wenzhou Medical College and Vice President of Hangzhou Medical College. He is currently the President and Deputy Party Secretary of Hangzhou Medical College.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖南省下辖的县级市，是梁广的家乡。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Hunan Province, China, and the hometown of Liang Guang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国浙江省杭州市的一所全日制公办普通本科高等院校。
description.en: A full-time public undergraduate higher education institution located in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的教育部直属全国重点大学，是“211工程”和“985工程优势学科创新平台”重点建设院校。
description.en: A national key university directly under the Ministry of Education located in Beijing, China, and part of the 'Project 211' and '985 Project Advantage Discipline Innovation Platform'.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国云南省昆明市的科研机构，主要从事贵金属领域的研究。
description.en: A research institution located in Kunming, Yunnan Province, China, primarily engaged in research in the field of precious metals.

en: Nanjing University of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江苏省南京市的全国重点大学，隶属于工业和信息化部。
description.en: A national key university located in Nanjing, Jiangsu Province, China, affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国弗吉尼亚州里士满的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Richmond, Virginia, United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国浙江省温州市的一所高等医学院校，现已更名为温州医科大学。
description.en: A higher medical institution located in Wenzhou, Zhejiang Province, China, now known as Wenzhou Medical University.

description.zh-cn: 中国工程院院士，曾任温州医学院药学院院长，是梁广的导师。
description.en: An academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, former Dean of the School of Pharmacy at Wenzhou Medical College, and mentor to Liang Guang.

description.zh-cn: 中国医学专家，梁广的前任杭州医学院校长。
description.en: A Chinese medical expert and the predecessor of Liang Guang as the President of Hangzhou Medical College.

description.zh-cn: “国家高层次人才特殊支持计划”的简称，是中国一项旨在支持高层次创新创业人才的国家级人才计划。
description.en: Abbreviation for the 'National High-level Talents Special Support Program', a national talent program in China aimed at supporting high-level innovative and entrepreneurial talents.

nodes.id: 国家优秀青年科学基金

zh-cn: 国家优秀青年科学基金
en: National Science Fund for Excellent Young Scholars

description.zh-cn: 由国家自然科学基金委员会设立，旨在支持在基础研究方面已取得较好成绩的青年学者自主选择研究方向开展创新研究的科学基金。
description.en: A science fund established by the National Natural Science Foundation of China to support young scholars who have achieved good results in basic research to independently choose research directions and carry out innovative research.

nodes.id: 科技部中青年科技创新领军人才

zh-cn: 科技部中青年科技创新领军人才
en: Leading Talents in Scientific and Technological Innovation for Young and Middle-aged Individuals by the Ministry of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 由中国科学技术部评选的一项人才荣誉，旨在支持和培养中青年科技领域的领军人物。
description.en: A talent honor selected by the Ministry of Science and Technology of China, aimed at supporting and cultivating leading figures in the field of science and technology among young and middle-aged individuals.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国药理学工作者组成的全国性、学术性、非营利性社会团体。
description.en: A national, academic, and non-profit social organization composed of pharmacological professionals in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 梁广出生于湖南浏阳。
description.en: Liang Guang was born in Liuyang, Hunan.

description.zh-cn: 梁广是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Liang Guang is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 2002年毕业于北京化工大学应用化学系精细化工专业，获得学士学位。
description.en: Graduated in 2002 from the Department of Applied Chemistry, majoring in Fine Chemicals, at Beijing University of Chemical Technology with a bachelor's degree.

description.zh-cn: 2005年取得昆明贵金属研究所贵金属药物化学硕士学位。
description.en: Obtained a Master's degree in Precious Metal Pharmaceutical Chemistry from the Kunming Institute of Precious Metals in 2005.

description.zh-cn: 2007年获得南京理工大学化工学院生物化学专业博士学位。
description.en: Obtained a PhD in Biochemistry from the School of Chemical Engineering at Nanjing University of Science and Technology in 2007.

description.zh-cn: 获得博士学位后，于2007年至2008年在美国弗吉尼亚医学院微生物与免疫系留学一年。
description.en: After obtaining his PhD, he studied abroad for one year from 2007 to 2008 in the Department of Microbiology and Immunology at the VCU School of Medicine in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 梁广在温州医学院任职期间，师从时任药学院院长的李校堃。
description.en: During his tenure at Wenzhou Medical College, Liang Guang was mentored by Li Xiaokun, who was then the Dean of the School of Pharmacy.

position.zh-cn: 药学院副院长、院长，研究生院院长
position.en: Deputy Dean and Dean of the School of Pharmacy, Dean of the Graduate School

description.zh-cn: 梁广在中国工作后，首先在温州医学院任职，历任药学院副院长、院长，研究生院院长。
description.en: After returning to China to work, Liang Guang first held positions at Wenzhou Medical College, successively serving as Deputy Dean and Dean of the School of Pharmacy, and Dean of the Graduate School.

position.en: Vice President, Member of the Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 2020年8月，梁广调任杭州医学院副院长、党委委员。
description.en: In August 2020, Liang Guang was transferred to Hangzhou Medical College as Vice President and a member of the Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2023年3月，梁广升任杭州医学院院长、党委副书记。
description.en: In March 2023, Liang Guang was promoted to President and Deputy Party Secretary of Hangzhou Medical College.

description.zh-cn: 梁广接替黄东胜，担任杭州医学院校长。
description.en: Liang Guang succeeded Huang Dongsheng as the President of Hangzhou Medical College.

description.zh-cn: 梁广曾获得国家“万人计划”科技创新领军人才荣誉。
description.en: Liang Guang was honored as a leading talent in scientific and technological innovation under the national 'Ten Thousand Talents Program'.

relationships.source: 国家优秀青年科学基金

description.zh-cn: 梁广曾获得国家优秀青年科学基金。
description.en: Liang Guang was a recipient of the National Science Fund for Excellent Young Scholars.

relationships.source: 科技部中青年科技创新领军人才

description.zh-cn: 梁广曾获得科技部中青年科技创新领军人才荣誉。
description.en: Liang Guang was honored as a leading talent in scientific and technological innovation for young and middle-aged individuals by the Ministry of Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 梁广担任中国药理学会第十一届理事会理事。
description.en: Liang Guang serves as a council member of the 11th Council of the Chinese Pharmacological Society.
